metadata.synopsis: PAD that will be triggered after the first Emperor Warning in Baldur's Gate
metadata.how_to_trigger: Going to Baldur's Gate, the gate, and try to walk through the bridge with a tadpoled character. After the first Emperor Warning, this PAD will be triggered.
